languages.text: "Это все, Лорд-капитан. Корабль и команда ждут ваших указаний и готовы немедленно покинуть Футфол, если вы того пожелаете".

traits.locale_text: "В основе империи Лорда-капитана Теодоры лежало три системы: процветающий агромир Янус, мир-завод Кьява Гамма и, непосредственно, столица империи — Даргонус".

languages.text: "That is all, Lord Captain. The vessel and the crew await your instructions and are ready to depart Footfall immediately, should you so desire."
languages.original_text: "Это все, Лорд-капитан. Корабль и команда ждут ваших указаний и готовы немедленно покинуть Футфол, если вы того пожелаете".

traits.locale_text: "This is all, Lord Captain. The vessel and the crew await your instructions are ready to depart Footfall immediately, should you so desire."
"That is all, Lord Captain. The vessel and the crew await your instructions and are ready to depart Footfall immediately, should you so desire."
"That is all, Lord Captain. The vessel and the crew await your instructions and are ready to depart Footfall immediately, should you so desire."
"That is all, Lord Captain. The vessel and the crew await your instructions and are ready to depart Footfall immediately, should you so desire."

languages.text: «Eso es todo, L{mf|ord|ady} Capit{mf|án|ana}. La nave y su tripulación esperan sus instrucciones y podemos zarpar desde Paso en cuanto lo desee».
languages.original_text: "That is all, Lord Captain. The vessel and the crew await your instructions and are ready to depart Footfall immediately, should you so desire."

traits.locale_text: «Eso es todo, L{mf|ord|ady} Capit{mf|án|ana}. La nave y su tripulación esperan sus instrucciones y podemos zarpar desde Paso en cuanto lo desee».

languages.text: “目前就是这些了，舰长大人。这艘船与船员们都在等待您的指示。如果您愿意的话，所有人都可以即刻离开落脚港。”
languages.original_text: "That is all, Lord Captain. The vessel and the crew await your instructions and are ready to depart Footfall immediately, should you so desire."

traits.locale_text: “目前就是这些了，舰长大人。这艘船与船员们都在等待您的指示。如果您愿意的话，所有人都可以即刻离开落脚港。”

languages.text: 「以上になります、ロード・キャプテン。船とクルーは陛下の指示を待っており、お望みとあらば、すぐにでもフットフォールを出発できる状態です」
languages.original_text: "That is all, Lord Captain. The vessel and the crew await your instructions and are ready to depart Footfall immediately, should you so desire."

traits.locale_text: 「以上になります、ロード・キャプテン。船とクルーは陛下の指示を待っており、お望みとあらば、すぐにでもフットフォールを出発できる状態です」

languages.text: "Das wäre alles, Lord Captain. Das Schiff und die Crew erwarten Eure Befehle und sind bereit, Footfall umgehend zu verlassen, falls Ihr das wünscht."
languages.original_text: "That is all, Lord Captain. The vessel and the crew await your instructions and are ready to depart Footfall immediately, should you so desire."

traits.locale_text: "Das wäre alles, Lord Captain. Das Schiff und die Crew erwarten Eure Befehle und sind bereit, Footfall umgehend zu verlassen, falls Ihr das wünscht."

languages.text: « C'est tout pour le moment, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. Le vaisseau et l'équipage attendent vos instructions et se tiennent prêts à quitter Castel immédiatement, si vous le souhaitez. »
languages.original_text: "That is all, Lord Captain. The vessel and the crew await your instructions and are ready to depart Footfall immediately, should you so desire."

traits.locale_text: « C'est tout pour le moment, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. Le vaisseau et l'équipage attendent vos instructions et se tiennent prêts à quitter Castel immédiatement, si vous le souhaitez. »

languages.text: "Hepsi bu kadardı Lord Kaptan. Gemi ve mürettebat, talimatlarınızı bekliyor. Dilerseniz Binliman'dan hemen ayrılmaya hazırız."
languages.original_text: "That is all, Lord Captain. The vessel and the crew await your instructions and are ready to depart Footfall immediately, should you so desire."

traits.locale_text: "Hepsi bu kadar Lord Kaptan. Gemi ve mürettebat, talimatlarınızı bekliyor ve dilerseniz Binliman'a derhâl yola çıkmaya hazır."
